subpanels.description: Sarcophila latifrons (Fallén, 1817), male, Xinjiang, Altay, Kalamaili, 26.V.2014, MZ leg. Habitus, lateral view. The subpanel shows the overall body shape and structure of a male Sarcophila latifrons specimen collected in Xinjiang, Altay, Kalamaili on May 26, 2014. The lateral view allows for observation of the side profile of the specimen.

Sarcophila latifrons (Fallén, 1817), male, Xinjiang, Altay, Kalamaili, 26.V.2014, MZ leg. Head, lateral view. This subpanel provides a lateral view of the head of a male Sarcophila latifrons specimen collected in Xinjiang, Altay, Kalamaili on May 26, 2014. It allows for observation of the side profile of the head.

Sarcophila latifrons (Fallén, 1817), male, Xinjiang, Altay, Kalamaili, 26.V.2014, MZ leg. Head, anterior view. This subpanel provides an anterior view of the head of a male Sarcophila latifrons specimen collected in Xinjiang, Altay, Kalamaili on May 26, 2014. It allows for observation of the front side of the head.

Sarcophila latifrons (Fallén, 1817), male, Xinjiang, Altay, Kalamaili, 26.V.2014, MZ leg. Head, anterolateral view. This subpanel provides an anterolateral view of the head of a male Sarcophila latifrons specimen collected in Xinjiang, Altay, Kalamaili on May 26, 2014. It allows for observation of the front and side profile of the head.

Sarcophila latifrons (Fallén, 1817), male, Xinjiang, Altay, Kalamaili, 26.V.2014, MZ leg. Right wing, dorsal view. This subpanel provides a dorsal view of the right wing of a male Sarcophila latifrons specimen collected in Xinjiang, Altay, Kalamaili on May 26, 2014. It allows for observation of the upper side of the right wing.

Sarcophila latifrons (Fallén, 1817), male, Xinjiang, Altay, Kalamaili, 26.V.2014, MZ leg. Abdomen, dorsal view. This subpanel provides a dorsal view of the abdomen of a male Sarcophila latifrons specimen collected in Xinjiang, Altay, Kalamaili on May 26, 2014. It allows for observation of the upper side of the abdomen.
